title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 171 N-152
description: Black and gray water exchange area. It works with 2 Euros.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 105 Avinguda dels Pirineus
description: Pyrenees road

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 4 Avinguda França
description: In addition to being a sports store that rents ski equipment, they have Cepsa light propane (blue handle aluminum) they also have butane (red handle aluminum). That if you change an empty cylinder for a full one, you do not make new contracts. You can park at the door, if there are not many cars, ACs of all sizes can fit.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 11 Carrer Via Ceretana
description: Place to rest and spend the night, 5 minutes from the center of Puigcerda I recommend fifteen parking spaces.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 15 Passeig de la Sèquia
description: Parking in a promenade with trees and good shade. Ideal for summer, but travelers change cars on the side. To sleep better, go to the street that goes to the new hospital de la Cerdagne.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 3 Carrer Can Pedraza
description: Very quiet overnight parking without services, but close to the center. There is a park. Not suited for vehicules longer than 5m.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 8 Urbanització Deulofeu
description: Free parking area. Without services, near the center. Quiet at night.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 103P Plaça Pla Parcial Sup
description: Huge plot where you can spend the night without problems and with hardly any noise...we slept next to 2 other motorhomes...

title: (66760) Bourg-Madame - 1 Place de l'Hostellerie Cerdane
description: Basic parking in the middle of Bourgmadame,no services for AC's at all but 2 min walking from any shop you need. With opctions to walk along the Segre River and close buy a park for kids.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 225P Plaça Pla Parcial Sup
description: Parking very quiet and with many places 10-15min from the center. Green area next to it

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 16 Urbanització Deulofeu
description: Very quiet residential area, 5 min from the lake and 10 min walk from the center, unmarked parking but you can park without problem

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 12P Urbanització Deulofeu
description: Good place to spend a night road next door but little traveled

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 4P Urbanització Deulofeu
description: Dead end street within the urbanization, 5 minutes from Schierbeck Park and very close to the center. It is a street with neighbors nearby, let's avoid taking out tables or chairs to avoid problems. We have slept super quiet 3 AC. It is a very practical place for sightseeing

name: Càmping el Segre

name: Camping Mas Piques

name: Camping Stel
title: (17520) Camping Stel
description: Quiet campsite in perfect situation, since it is 10min. walk from the center of Puigcerda. Shaded and spacious pitches. Large games room, paddle court and swimming pool. They organize excursions and activities for children.

title: (17520) Puigcerdà - 19 Carrer Cami de Futbol
description: Football field parking. Very quiet area

title: (66760) Bourg-Madame - N-154
description: Carrefour parking, next to McDonald's, we slept there with three other motorhomes.

title: (66760) Ur - D68
description: Beautiful newly created parking areas behind MC Donalds for about 2x5 campers. You can just drive around here in a square, it's not a dead end. The seats are nice and wide, so that you can easily open all the doors. Despite the proximity to the road, it is very quiet here. Traffic is very little at night. Wifi and toilets are available at MC Donalds. You can also go shopping at the Carrefour, which is also on the premises. Our dogs are also happy, there is a lot of green space and everything is fenced. The view of the mountains is also wonderful.

name: Camping Pirineus
title: (17528) Camping Pirineus
description: Pirineus campsite. Tarifa pernocta todo incluido luz personas 27 euros. Parcelas especiales niveladas

address.street: Km. 2 Carretera de Guils de Cerdanya

title: (66760) Ur - 16B Route d'Espagne
description: Barbecue area with tables. Very quiet and shady with grass and a stream right next to it. Ideal to come and eat and have a good time with the children.

name: Camping de la Gare

description: Camping de la Gare located on the tourist route of the yellow train, hiking and ski slope access to Andorra and Pas de la Casa. Nice place with lots of trees. The toilets are very clean and heated in winter. extremely friendly campsite open all year round camper van reception rates please note entry in winter is only before 7 p.m. maximum. Thanks.

title: (17538) - Unnamed Road

title: () Bourg-Madame - D30

name: Las Asperas campsite

title: (66760) Ur - 4B Rue de Brangoly
description: Small car park in Ur, we slept during our stay. There are few spaces and a little sloping.

name: Camping le Robinson

name: The Campsite *** El Pailles
title: (66340) The Campsite *** El Pailles
description:
The Campsite *** El Pailles, open all year round, offers you calm, wide open spaces and tranquility.
Come and discover the many walks and activities to do in summer and winter from this preserved place in the heart of the Natural Park of the Catalan Pyrenees.
We will be happy to welcome you in a friendly and warm atmosphere!

title: (66760) Latour-de-Carol -

I preferred this place to the Angoustrine car park because it is shaded during hot hours and the internet network (SFR) is present, unlike the center car park. Very quiet at night despite the nearby road. A path provides a pleasant walk to the village of Dorres and its open-air hot baths.

title: (17538) Masella -

AC or high-volume AC is not recommended on the road, since to get there the terrain is quite eroded by the rain and there are enough stones that the van tilts you. Very wide area.

name: Laverie Revolution Laundry
title: (66120) Laverie Revolution Laundry
description:
Self-service outdoor laundromat from Revolution Laundry, available 24/7* on a supermarket or a gas station parking. Useful to do your laundry while running errands! It’s possible to receive a text message 5min before the end of the washing cycle.
For more washing advice, visit our website: www.revolution-laundry.com
*According to the opening times of the place

title: (66800) Err - La Forêt d'Err
description: Parking abandoned ski slopes Err-Puigmal

title: (17538) Urús - 1D Cami Rota
description: Urus, a starting point for a 6 km long medium circular route.

name: Camping
title: (66120) Camping
description: Camping "Las Clotes" very nice, shady, and quiet. Manager very welcoming.

title: (17536) Toses -
description: Quiet place at the end of a long path. The path does not lead any further here (dead end). There is nothing here but forest and a stream. A quiet place to enjoy. Smaller and larger hikes can be undertaken from here - the French border is not far...

title: (66800) Llo - Voie communale Carretera de Sallagosa
title_short: (66800) Llo - Voie communale Carretera de Sallagosa
description: Motorhome car park for the Bains de Llo which permits overnight parking.  Nice quiet spot.  Hot baths are well worth a visit for a couple of hours in the late afternoon.  35 Deg .  A nice Via Ferrata (you can rent the equipment on site), and good selection of walks.  Open so can be windy.  Superb views.

title: (17538) Urús - Carretera de Coma Oriola
description: Parking at the foot of the slopes, quiet until 8 in the morning when it fills up with cars. No services, but there is a cafeteria.

title: (66760) Porta - 81 La Codina
description: Parking area near the road, with an information panel, stone picnic tables, comfortable rocks and close to the river. On the other side of the road there is a nice path next to the river.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 6-14 Impasse de la Fontaine
description: Small concrete parking lot next to the town hall.

title: (17537) La Molina - Avinguda Masella
description: Parking of the lake of the Station of the Molina. Parking on a slope. We have spent the night: we have been alone, very quiet by the lake. Great to go with children, there is a park to play, you can walk next to the lake, hiking trails... In summer the chairlift does not work. Highly recommended.

title: (66340) Valcebollère - Camí del Puigmal
description: Parking at the end of the world at the Spanish border, departure point for walks. Not recommended for large riders (we sometimes pass just between the branches with a compact) the access road is narrow and closed from 10 p.m. to 6 a.m. Camping prohibited: do not leave awnings and tables and thank you for respecting this wild place so that we do not find ourselves in the future with outright prohibitions.

title: (17537) Alp - Avinguda Roc Blanc
description: Parking down the road, very discreet, with mountain views. Peaceful night.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via -
description: Parking, 30 seats. At the train station. and very close to the church with picnic area, barbecue and picnic table. Quiet place and protected from the north wind.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 13 Rue de la République
description: Free parking in the village center with shops nearby. Possibilities of hikes departures. Small yellow train station within 1km.

title: (66800) Saillagouse - N116
description: Rest area with 4 stone tables and benches. trash cans.

title: (17537) Alp - Avinguda Roc Blanc
description: Quiet place and easy access.

title: (17538) Alp - N-260
description: Stunning view from this mountain top spot over the road from the hotel. Very quiet at night.

title: (66800) Llo - 2 Carrer de la Font Del Miquelo
title_short: (66800) Llo - 2 Carrer de la Font Del Miquelo
description: Parking of the Gorges du segre, for van and 4x4.

address.street: 2 Carrer de la Font Del Miquelo

name: AIREPARK Font-Romeu
title: (66120) AIREPARK Font-Romeu
description:
The city of Font-Romeu is located in an exceptional environment for you to take full advantage of its pure air and its wide open spaces. This city located at 1800 m altitude in the heart of the Regional Natural Park of the Catalan Pyrenees. Located in Font Romeu Odeillo Via, the motorhome area is made up of 28 pitches, all equipped with electrical terminals. An emptying area, filling, Wifi and video surveillance complete this equipment.
Trash cans nearby (see photo)

title: (17537) La Molina - GI-400
description: Level parking area beside a quiet road, just off the N-260. At 1800 M, it was chilly but the view of the Mountains is lovely. Nothing to disturb an overnight stop.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via -
description: On the way several places to park either by van or by camper. As we were alone we chose the one at the very end near a rocky peak. The view is breathtaking. It's great for animals. Our cat loved it too

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 10 Route de Bolquere
description: Beautiful place. Stunning quiet view for picnic.

title: (17537) La Molina - Carretera de Toses
description: Parking near hill crossroad

title: (17537) Alp - BV-4031
description: Ski resort parking. there is a bar-restaurant and there are public toilets.

title: (17539) Meranges - 2 Carrer Central
description: Perfect place, it seems to be new or recently flattened, at the entrance it says municipal parking, it's very good, starting point for the excursion to the Malniu lake, for AC it's a bit complicated, it's in the center of town with a street very closed

name: Camping BELLVER
title: (17539) Camping BELLVER
description: Camping BELLVER. It had been more than twenty years that we had not come, but when we arrived it has continued to seem like that familiar and friendly campsite that we knew. Clean services, great pool and bar with very short hours. We have taken a plot next to the river that has left us delighted and above all relaxed. We travel by motorhome. There is black and clean water service but not gray water (keep that in mind). Price 22.7 euros, two adults without electricity. I do not value it with a higher note due to the lack of specific services for itinerant tourists (MOTORHOMES).

title: (17538) Urús - Camí del Collet del Jovell
title_short: (17538) Urús - Camí del Collet del Jovell
description: Parking of the Urús cemetery, area near the town, there is a flat area

title: (17539) Meranges - 2 Carrer Central
description: Petit Parking Molt Tranquil in the upper part of the town. To arrive-hi s'ha de passar pel mig del poble, que tot i ser estret es passa amb AC sense problems. Molt bona vista, taules picnic area and a fountain. Small Very Quiet Parking in the upper part of the town. To get there you have to go through the middle of the town, which despite being narrow, can be passed with AC without any problems. Very good view, area with picnic tables and a fountain.

title: (25721) Riu de Cerdanya - C-16, km 13.6
description: Service area and rest tunnel of the cadi and door of cerdanya I have spent very quiet night parking address andorra address and address barcelona

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - N116
description: Parking along the road with 4 places, with a picnic area.

title: (17539) Meranges - GIV-4031
description: Remote mountain shelter. Car park & places for picnic. Road is VERY narrow, last 4 km are unpaved and quite rough.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 3 Avenue Jean Paul
description: Free parking, Avenue Jean Paul Font Romeu, along the chairlift cable at the tennis courts.

title: (17538) Urús -
description: Remote, quiet and beautiful place. Very good views. It is accessed through a long track with excellent landscapes in very good condition. About 300 m away there is a mountain refuge with a very rich natural source of drinking water!

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 3 Avenue Jean Paul
description: Small, slightly sloping, illuminated car park next to the municipal stadium and the skate park, 200 m from the city center.

title: (66760) Porta - 81 La Feuillatière
description: On the roadside 15 minutes from Pas de la Casa (Andorra), go down the small path (accessible with an h2 van), two parking spaces at the bottom, otherwise stay at the top. Overlooking a river where you can swim.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - Route de l'Ermitage
description: Parking menhir 200 meters from the center of Font Romeu. 30 places.

title: (17537) La Molina -
description: A place to spend day and night in peace, we have slept alone, in the morning people have come to spend the day in the snow. Perfect to go with children with sleds. Recommended 100%

name: Camping Huttopia Font- Romeu
title: (66120) Camping Huttopia Font- Romeu
description:
The campsite is at the entrance to the village in the heart of the state forest in Font-Romeu, France's sunniest resort.
Normal pitch package: one type of accommodation (motorhome)   2 persons and/or a vehicle.

title: (66800) Err - D89
description: Upper car park of the Puigmal ski resort. In summer there is no prohibition sign. P Parking with a slope but easily solvable. Asphalt access. Starting point to perform the Puigmal

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - Unnamed Road
description: 600m from the La Calme car park. In the pass of several hiking trails, a bit crowded during the silk day, but very quiet.

title: (66760) Porta - N20
description: Next to the road, level grass esplanade with some shade. Much space. Direct access to the river. We stop only to eat and rest but it is possible to spend the night. You can hear the noise of the cars a little, but it is not very annoying.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - Sola de la Calma Est
title_short: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - Sola de la Calma Est
description: JG Land at the foot of the Fontromeu slopes. A very busy car park during the day during weekends and school holidays.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via -
description: Parking on the side of the road very little frequented, quiet, at 2000m

title: (17538) Urús -
description: End of road for vehicles, full of nature

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 3 Rue du Four Solaire
description: Free parking without service. Stunning view super quiet

title: (66800) Eyne - 1 Avenue Avinguda de Cerdanya
description: Parking Maison de la Vallée, start of the hikes. Quiet at night, no prohibition sign.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 3 Rue du Four Solaire
description: Parking at the foot of the slopes (cross-country skiing, track special jumps ramps etc ...) great view, snowshoeing or hiking, beautiful corner.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 2 Avenue Pierre de Coubertin
description: Small parking lot going up towards the ice rink on the right rather pleasant to spend a night. No traffic with a small stream at the entrance of it.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 7 Route de l'Ermitage
description: Picnic area next to a viewpoint with a Calvary.

title: (66210) Bolquère - N116
description: Picnic table, rest area, possibility to spend the night there on the tarmacked flat part in a van, van or cc . Edge of RN therefore of the passage and motocross ground opposite (very little used). Perfect to stop for the night or have a bite to eat before continuing on the road

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 3 Rue du Four Solaire
description: Nice corner to spend the night to the sound of bells and the small river.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via -
description:
Just below Font Romeu station, after a small path easy to access by van.
breathtaking view of the mountains, great night.

title: (66760) Porta - Rue de la Gare
description: Large barrier-free roadside parking, a picnic table. Good for a quick stop,

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - D10F
description: Large flat and tarred parking lot. Opposite, picnic area with many tables, fountain and a large barbecue.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - D10F
description: Departure for summer and winter hikes, next to the altitspace, by the roadside but little traffic. No service except garbage cans. Beautiful views a few meters away, beautiful place, calm, flat.

title: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya -
description: Place behind a large ruin, with some shade. Perfect for a meal or a night, no passage during our meal stop. Entrance a bit complicated for a VL we have a 4x4. Very quiet and clean places not to degrade.

title: (66120) Font-Romeu-Odeillo-Via - 7 Rue du Docteur Tulpin
description: Picnic area a little off the road. Nice place for a break

title: (66760) Porta - 2 Rue du Campcardos
description: Large flat parking lot. Only one car this July 10. Surrounded by mountains and close to the village (to the sound of the bell tower) we can hear the stream in the distance. The road is not far but not too disturbing. No service on the other hand a restaurant within walking distance and very good value for money !! (Porta hostel)

title: (17536) Toses - Carretera de Toses
description: Next to a football field and games for children. The train goes right by. Quiet and right next to Toses pretty typical village.

title: (17539) Meranges - Carretera dels Estanys
description: Parking, starting point for hiking. Very quiet, stream nearby.

title: (66210) Bolquère - 21 Chemin d'Odeillo
description: Next to the cemetery, a few kilometers from Font Romeu. Nice place with a patch of grass and a wooden table. A little sloping. In my opinion, park near the bench to let the company pass after the cemetery.

title: (08695) Bagà - BV-4024
description: Coll de Pal parking at 2100m altitude, without any service. In the same coll de Pal there are two areas, the main one more exposed to the wind and the signposted one that is more protected. Large space. Very quiet area, the road is very little traveled and used to access the coll. Starting point for many excursions.

title: (66800) Eyne - 44 Avenue de Catalogne
description:
Big open field. There is a road nearby which gives access to Cambre d'Aze's Ski resort, Eyne sector..

We spent one night here and it was very windy.

title: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 28 Carrer Baridà
description: Parking without services near the center of town. Restaurants and supermarket nearby. Good access from the road, but don't trust the GPS too much as it can get you through the alleys of the center. There are many squares but some with inclination. We have slept very peacefully.

title: (25721) Bor - 11 Lloc Bor,ag. Bor
description: Right next to Cementerio Latera for 2 or 3 vans in line.

title: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 17 Carrer de l'Arbre
title_short: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 17 Carrer de l'Arbre
description: New parking, very central. It is uneven, but it does its job very well to visit the town or even sleep (I have not seen any signage that prohibits it). There's a fountain in the playground a little further up. Nearby there are green areas, playgrounds, garbage, and shops of all kinds.

title: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 33 Avinguda de la Solana
title_short: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 33 Avinguda de la Solana
description: Final part of an urbanization. Asphalted, no noise, slight slope. Fantastic views over Bellver. We didn't spend the night there

title: (66800) Eyne - D33
description: Quiet on a plateau with a 360 view of the Pyrenees

title: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 4 Carrer Pujada Joan Alay
title_short: (25720) Bellver de Cerdanya - 4 Carrer Pujada Joan Alay
description: Parking of the wall, upper level, some roughly flat spaces, beware the spaces are short about 5 m suitable only for small vans quiet night, very beautiful medieval village to visit by taking the elevator at the end of the parking lot

title: (66210) Bolquère - 313 D618
description: Easy Access Laundry Room With Plenty Of Parking At The Door
